sentences.sContent: Ireland looks like an abstemious jogger that has suffered a heart attack.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ireland looks like an abstemious jogger that has suffered a heart attack.
sentences.sCn: 爱尔兰看似一位心脏病发作的有节制的慢跑者。

sentences.sContent: The women also mentioned the "rampant" sex that the supposedly spiritual and abstemious monks practiced with each other in the Gelugpa sect.
sentences.sContent_eng: The women also mentioned the "rampant" sex that the supposedly spiritual and abstemious monks practiced with each other in the Gelugpa sect.
sentences.sCn: 这些妇女还提及在理论上应该精神化并有节制的格鲁派僧侣之间“疯狂的”性行为。

synos.tran: 节约的，节省的；有节制的

remMethod.val: abs(脱离) + tem(酒) + ious → 不喝酒 → 有节制的

trans.tranOther: careful not to have too much food, drink etc
